word:
MR No. 787 - The Outlook for a Sanitarium at Adelaide

     The Lord understands all our necessities. The outlook for establishing a sanitarium at Adelaide is much more favorable than the outlook for establishing one at Melbourne. . . . Do not establish institutions in the cities, but seek a rural location.--Letter 158, 1906, pp. 1,2. (To Dr. H. D. Kress and Wife, May 10, 1906.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. April 10, 1980
